description: Automate resume parsing, review, scoring, and LinkedIn profile/company data retrieval with Magical API.

actions.name: get_company_data
actions.description: Given a company name, LinkedIn username, or website, fetch comprehensive company info.

actions.name: get_profile_data
actions.description: Given a LinkedIn profile username, retrieve comprehensive profile data.

actions.name: parse_resume
actions.description: Extract structured data (name, email, experience, skills, etc.) from a resume file.

actions.name: review_resume
actions.description: Analyze parsed resume using predefined criteria.

actions.name: score_resume
actions.description: Scores a resume against a job description and provides a reason.
